scripts.clean: rm -rf static\css && mkdir static\css && rm -rf static\js && mkdir static\js && rm -rf static\img && rm -rf static\model-data && rm -rf dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-css && npm run build-js && cp -r source/img static/img && cp -r source/model-data static
scripts.build-dist: npm run build && mkdir dist && cp -r static/* dist && pug source/templates/index.pug -o dist && cp source/js/waitingDialog.js dist/js
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-js" "nodemon server -e js,pug" "cp -r source/img static/img" "cp -r source/model-data static" "cp source/js/waitingDialog.js static/js"
